subroutine move_box(source_num, source_red, other_num, other_red)

    integer, intent(inout) :: source_num, other_num
    logical, intent(inout) :: source_red, other_red

    if (source_num ==0) then
        return
    else if (source_num == 1) then
        source_num = 0
        other_num = other_num +1
        if (source_red) then
            other_red = .true.
        end if
        source_red = .false.
    else ! source_num >=2
        source_num = source_num -1
        other_num = other_num +1
        if (source_red) then
            other_red = .true.
        end if
    end if

end subroutine move_box

    logical, intent(inout) :: s_red, o_red

    if ( s_num ==0 ) then
        return
    else if ( s_num ==1 ) then
        s_num = 0
        o_num = o_num +1
        if ( s_red ) then
            o_red = .true.
        end if
        ! set source red to false
        s_red = .false.
    else
        s_num = s_num - 1
        o_num = o_num +1
        if ( s_red ) then
            o_red = .true.
        end if
    end if
end subroutine move_box
